The centre conducts world-class artificial intelligence research focusing on societal challenges, people and design while putting Denmark at the international forefront. Collaboratories The centre will be organized in a collaboratory structure, with seven collaboratories structured around an AI research theme with 2-3 PIs as well as PhD students and postdocs attached.
